The certainty of heavenly and the uncertainty of earthly treasures together with a discovery where the treasure and heart is placed / as it was delivered in severall sermons by that eminently faithfull servant of Christ, Mr. William Strong ... Strong, William, d. 1654.
[2], 204 [i.e. 203] p.
Printed by W. Wilson ... and are to be sold by Francis Tyton ..., London : [1654]
Date of publication suggested by Wing. Imperfect: pages torn with loss of imprint date. Reproduction of original in: New College (University of Edinburgh). Library.
